org.spongepowered.api.event.entity.player

Interface PlayerEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EntityEvent, Event, GameEvent, HumanEvent, LivingEvent, UserEvent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AchievementEvent, PlayerBanEvent, PlayerBreakBlockEvent, PlayerCastFishingLineEvent, PlayerChangeBlockEvent, PlayerChangeGameModeEvent, PlayerChangeHealthEvent, PlayerChangeWorldEvent, PlayerChatEvent, PlayerDeathEvent, PlayerDropItemEvent, PlayerEnterBedEvent, PlayerEquipmentChangeEvent, PlayerExpChangeEvent, PlayerFishEvent, PlayerHarvestBlockEvent, PlayerHookedEntityEvent, PlayerInteractBlockEvent, PlayerInteractEntityEvent, PlayerInteractEvent, PlayerItemConsumeEvent, PlayerJoinEvent, PlayerKickEvent, PlayerLeaveBedEvent, PlayerLevelChangeEvent, PlayerMoveEvent, PlayerPardonEvent, PlayerPickUpItemEvent, PlayerPlaceBlockEvent, PlayerQuitEvent, PlayerResourcePackStatusEvent, PlayerRespawnEvent, PlayerRetractFishingLineEvent, PlayerSleepEvent, PlayerUpdateEvent, StatisticChangeEvent

    public interface PlayerEvent
extends HumanEvent, UserEvent
    Describes events which contain a Player.

    • Method Summary
